sub_fields.label: Background Type
sub_fields.name: background_type
sub_fields.instructions:
Set a background color OR a background image.
Leave on '-Select' (or set to '-Select') for NO background.

sub_fields.label: Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a light or dark overlay.

sub_fields.label: Background Opacity
sub_fields.name: background_opacity
sub_fields.instructions:
Select a number between 0 and 10.
The lower the value, the less transparency.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: You can adjust the color if needed to contrast with a background image.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions:
Adjust text color if needed.
Leave blank for default theme colors to apply.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions:
Adjust text color if needed.
Leave blank for default theme colors to apply.
